title: UDL-Based Online Language Education Course for Cultivating Expert Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher language proficiency and basic online learning skills
context.additional_context: Asynchronous education for working professionals ensuring flexible learning schedules, based on BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three self-directed learning strategies based on UDL principles
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in expert learner competencies (self-assessment, metacognition, learning transfer) in the language domain
Learners can design and execute personalized learning pathways using various digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
